comment: Couldn’t even finish a dram. Sweet artificial flavor.
Literally the worst thing I’ve ever tried. I would choose Malort over this. Gave the bottle away for free. Never again - save your money
Carmel notes and smooth finish. Easy to drink and great price
Tons of Carmel on the nose, and definitely on the tongue. Easy to drink, and very smooth.
Smells exactly like cake batter for some reason
Horrible!   What a waste of money!
gives a burning feeling on the lips after the sip
Hints of vanilla toffee and caramel. Good mixer with white monster
County Cavan!!! Never realized that it wasn't an actual whisky. Makes sense though. Heat up front giving away to a lot of caramel sweetness.
Thought I’d accidentally gotten spiced rum or something at first. Good in coffee.

Super sweet. Saw it at a bar, and didn’t realize exactly what it was. I feel hoodwinked! Starts off with very strong notes of vanilla and caramel and maybe honey and a strong alcohol punch. After the third sip, tastes like straight banana pudding. I was def hoping for something a bit more nuanced, even if it is strong.
Nice ABV for a dessert whiskey.
I get a hint of caramel, but 90% of a cream soda...mostly cream soda. I like cream soda, but this is too sweet for me.
